r.d: This package provides an objective wrapper for OpenSSL Crypto Library
r.n: * Incremental cipher decryption and encryption * Support for authenticated encryption and decryption (GCM and CCM modes) * Incremental hash creation * Methods for retrieving informations about cipher and hash algorithms * HMAC and CMAC creation * Random numbers API including seeding and saving/loading PRNG state * Incremental Base64 decoding and encoding
